title: Design User Interface for 'PaphosFrontend'
description: Create the user interface for the 'PaphosFrontend' service. The main requirement is to display the word 'Paphos' at the center of the screen. Use HTML5 and CSS3 for the design. The interface must be responsive and work well on different screen sizes. No specific performance or scalability requirements are needed as the display is static. Acceptance criteria: The word 'Paphos' is correctly displayed at the center of the screen on different devices and screen sizes.

title: Implement 'PaphosFrontend' service
description: Implement 'PaphosFrontend' service using JavaScript. The service should display static HTML created in task #1. No database is required. The service should be implemented as a simple HTTP server that serves static files. It should use Node.js and Express.js. Acceptance criteria: The service serves the static HTML files correctly and the word 'Paphos' is displayed at the center of the screen when the service is accessed from a web browser.

title: Test 'PaphosFrontend' service
description: Perform testing on the 'PaphosFrontend' service to ensure it meets the acceptance criteria outlined in tasks #1 and #2. Testing should include functional testing (ensuring the word 'Paphos' is displayed at the center of the screen) and compatibility testing (ensuring the display is correct on different devices and screen sizes). Use Jest for testing.
